channel.title: Need help [317]

item.title: Need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @flyer flyer
item.description:
@flyer wrote:

Hello all i have a problem where when i log out it wont log out for about 10 seconds and when it does log out it wont let me log back in for about another 10 seconds i was wondering why it was doing this.

in my clicking most 9154 is the log out button of course
this is the case for it.
Quote
case 9154:
// Log out
long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
if (c.inCombat) {
c.sM(“You must wait until you are out of combat before logging out!”);
break;
}
if(c.action == 1){
c.sM(“Suspicious activity!”);
break;
}
// if(c.currentHealth > 0)
c.logout();

Read full topic
